com.emc.vipr.client.core

Interface ACLResources

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlockVirtualPools, FileVirtualPools, Projects, VirtualArrays

    public interface ACLResources
    Interface for resources which support ACLs.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<ACLEntry> getACLs(java.net.URI id)
      Gets the ACL entries for a given resource by ID.
      java.util.List<ACLEntry> updateACLs(java.net.URI id, ACLAssignmentChanges aclChanges)
      Updates the ACL entries for a given resource by ID.

    • Method Detail

      • getACLs

        java.util.List<ACLEntry> getACLs(java.net.URI id)
        Gets the ACL entries for a given resource by ID.

        API Call: GET baseUrl/{id}/acl

        Parameters:
        id - the resource ID.
        Returns:
        the list of ACL entries.

      • updateACLs

        java.util.List<ACLEntry> updateACLs(java.net.URI id,
                                  ACLAssignmentChanges aclChanges)
        Updates the ACL entries for a given resource by ID.

        API Call: PUT baseUrl/{id}/acl

        Parameters:
        id - the resource ID.
        aclChanges - the ACL changes to perform (ACL entries to add/remove).
        Returns:
        the resulting list of ACL entries after performing the update.
